import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import Product from "../components/Product" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/Message" import Paginate from '../components/Paginate' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProducts } from '../actions/productActions' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function HomeScreen({history}) { const navigate = useNavigate const dispatch = useDispatch() const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {error, loading, products, pages} = productList const location = useLocation() const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search) const keyword = searchParams.get('keyword') || '' const page = searchParams.get('page') || 1 console.log(keyword) useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProducts(keyword, page)) }, [dispatch, keyword, page]) return (

Latest Products

{loading ? : error ? {error} :
{products.map((product) => ( ))}
}
) } export default HomeScreen
